resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81701</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81701</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>215</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Quiz on Drama Stories</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre historias trágicas</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist ar Scéalta Drámaí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quiz auf Drama-Geschichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu sur des histoires de drame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz em histórias do drama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz sulle storia di dramma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων στις ιστορίες δράματος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The students become more familiar with different types of stories and learn the categories. Their interest in hearing the stories again is stimulated.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes se familiarizarán con diferentes tipos de historias y conocerán las categorías. Se estimula su interés para escuchar las historias de nuevo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cuireann daltaí aithne níos fearr ar chineálacha difriúla scéalta agus foghlaimeoidh siad faoi na catagóir. Spreagtar a suim sna scéalta a chloisteáil arís.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Drama</string>
            <string language="es">Teatro</string>
            <string language="ga">Dráma</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kursteilnehmer werden mit unterschiedlichen 
Typen von Geschichten vertrauter und erlernen die Kategorien. 
Ihr Interesse, an, die Geschichten zu hören wieder, angeregt 
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants se familiarisent avec différents 
types d'histoires et apprennent les catégories. Leur intérêt 
en entendant les histoires encore est stimulé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes tornam-se mais familiares com os 
tipos diferentes de histórias e aprendem-se as categorias. Seu 
interesse em ouvir as histórias é estimulado outra vez.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi diventano più esperti con differenti
tipi di storia ed imparano le categorie. Il loro interesse nel 
sentire le storia è stimolato ancora.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές γίνονται πιό εξοικειωμένοι με τους 
διαφορετικούς τύπους ιστοριών και μαθαίνουν τις κατηγορίες. 
Το ενδιαφέρον τους για την ακοή των ιστοριών πάλι 
υποκινείται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drama</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Drame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Drama</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dramma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δράμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>215</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

            </role>

VERSION:3.0

FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

          <language>en</language>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>

FN:Scoilnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
